main event: A reddish-orange ball appeared with flame protrusions and moved at an estimated 16,000 ft observed to move at a steady or slightly erratic pace for 1-2 min.
interesting points: The UFO was not tracked by radar,Positive identification was not possible due to lack of information,Several witnesses reported seeing the object transform into a doughnut shape,The sighting included descriptions of more than one ball by a witness while others only agreed on one,The event lasted approximately 10 minutes and occurred under clear weather conditions.
witness description: USAF personnel and a Japanese security guard
